project_descr:
Restoration of disrupted livelihoods of affected residents and displaced
people including returnees in East Aleppo through rehabilitation of basic
services and revival of local businesses and affected vocational workshops.

outputs.output_descr: Basic and social services infrastructure rehabilitation: improve access to basic services, enhance resilience of affected communities, and improve living conditions and accelerate return of IDPs through rehabilitation of basic and social infrastructure,

This output aims at : 
Provision of socioeconomic support including vocational training and distribution of productive assets to affected market and vocational workshops in the industrial zone in the project target areas (Kallaseh, Bostan Al Qaser, and Al Sha’ar)
Provision of on-the-job vocational training for youth and affected workers and skills people and provision of startups vocational tool kits
Reviving micro business and vocational workshops through distribution of productive equipment and assets to affected or newly established workshops in target areas.

Developing the capacities of NGOs/CBOs to engage in emergency responses with particular focus on livelihoods and early recovery initiatives and engaging youth and civil society to promote for social cohesion and the culture of tolerance and acceptance

Technical Assistance and operational and logistical support: 
- Staff and Other Personnel Costs (Area Manager, Area Coordinator, Area Assistant, Socioeconomic Technical Officer, Driver, Guards, Engineering Program Manager, Finance associate
- Supplies, Commodities, Materials
Travel / : DSA Cost for each field mission from Damascus to Aleppo in order to follow up on the implementation process and ensure the quality of work (3 missions) each mission will include 6 staff for 3 days each with total quantity 18 daily DSA
- General Operating and Other Direct Costs

document_name: Manufacturing and Providing Garbage Containers in The City of Aleppo
Supply of Machinery in three lots (Medium Crushers, Tractors and Loaders)
UNDP-SYR-RFQ-011-18 Rehabilitation of 66 damaged housing units in Al Kallaseh Neighborhood- Aleppo City
